stageList.title: Order Placed
stageList.desc: The order has been successfully confirmed by our system.

stageList.title: Quote Requested
stageList.desc: The seller has received your request for quote.

stageList.title: Quote Received
stageList.desc: The seller has provided a quote for your review.

stageList.title: Revision Requested
stageList.desc: The seller has received your request for revision.

stageList.title: Quote Accepted
stageList.desc: You have accepted the quote. The service will begin now.

stageList.title: Advance Payment Processed
stageList.desc: Your advance payment of has been successfully processed.

stageList.title: Work in Progress
stageList.desc: Your project is in progress. You will be notified upon completion.

stageList.title: Service Delivered
stageList.desc: The seller has delivered the service for your review.

stageList.title: Review Delivered Service
stageList.desc: Please review the service delivery items sent to you.

stageList.title: Review Completed
stageList.desc: You have reviewed and approved the service.

stageList.title: Final Payment Processed
stageList.desc: The remaining payment has been successfully processed.

stageList.title: Order Completed
stageList.desc: The order is now complete. Thank you for using our platform!

stageList.title: Order Rejected By You
stageList.desc: The order was cancelled by you.

stageList.title: Revision Requested
stageList.desc: The order was cancelled by you.
